name: Block Breaker (itch) (CatfishnChips)
description:
A short block breaker game made as a midterm assignment for university.

Controls -

  • Drag mouse to move.
  •  Left-click to shoot the ball to the desired location. 
  • After the ball is launched, Left-click to move the bumper forward. Hit the ball to give it speed.

Known Bugs - 

  • Ball can get stuck going sideways indefinitely. (Please restart the game.)
  •  Crab can carry the ball with it outside the play area. (Please restart the game.)
  • Mouse pointer disappears after playing a stage. (You can still click on the buttons.)
